article_title: Steve Forbes: Obamacare Is Just Unworkable
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: July 22 (Bloomberg) -- Forbes Media Chairman and Editor-In-Chief Steve Forbes, Bloomberg’s Jonathan Allen and Phil Mattingly discuss two federal appeals courts issuing opposite verdicts on whether the government can subsidize policies through federally run insurance exchanges. They speak on “Street Smart.” (Source: Bloomberg)
